title: Ticket #2663: Create better interface to control a running DAG
description: I'm deriving this from #2213 because I want to be able to mark that as finished as soon as the halt file implementation is finished. (That is kind of a quick-and-dirty hack to get LIGO the functionality they really want. But I think that long-term we really need a better overall solution than that, because there are lots of things we'd like to do to a running DAG besides halting it.)
